abstract: Sarah Palin is scheduled to make a surprise walk-on appearance with Conan O’Brien on NBC’s “Tonight Show,”
snippet: Sarah Palin is scheduled to make a surprise walk-on appearance with Conan O’Brien on NBC’s “Tonight Show,”
lead_paragraph: Updated | 10:02 p.m.  David Letterman has been all but begging Sarah Palin to grace his couch with a visit, but it was his competition, Conan O’Brien, who was granted the favor of a drop-in from the former vice-presidential candidate Friday night.
